content: sock baggie yarn malabrigo yarn silky merino cape cod grey 1 skein = 135 yards materials -needles us size 5 3 75 mm circular needles and dpn s -notions tapestry needle for weaving in ends beads optional crochet hook us 8 1 50 mm for placing beads techniques/abbreviations co cast-on p purl rw row/rws row k2tog knit two together pb place bead ssk slip slip knit k knit provisional cast-on sts stitches m1l increase stitch left leaning rem remaining yo yarn over m1r increase stitch right leaning repeat repeat notes -this pattern is knitted on-the-round with circular needles -make sure the crochet hook is small enough to fit through the bead holes -if you don t want to apply your beads using a crochet hook you can always string your beads on the yarn with a tapestry needle before you began knitting -the bag has 24 beads total -the drawstring is three strands of yarn in a braid -the drawstring is threaded through the holes before the poof balls are attached directions provisional cast-on using scrap yarn co 80 sts row 1-7 knit raw rw + 6 knit rws = 7 row row 8 *k2tog yo repeat around* picot edge row row 9-14 knit row 15 combine working rw sts with rw 1 sts by k2tog you should have 80 sts row 16 knit row 17 purl row 18-19 repeat rws 16 and 17 row 20 *k3 yo k2tog repeat until last sts* k last st you should have 16 yo this is the drawstring row row 21 & 22 repeat rws 16 and 17 row 23 knit row 24 *k1 p19 repeat around* row 25 knit row 26 *m1r k1 m1l k19 repeat around* 88 sts row 27 knit row 28 k1 *m1r k1 m1l k21 repeat 2 more times* m1r k1 m1l k20 96 sts row 29 knit row 30 k2 *m1r k1 m1l k23 repeat 2 more times* m1r k1 m1l k21 104 sts row 31 knit row 32 k3 *m1r k1 m1l k25 repeat 2 more times* m1r k1 m1l k22 112 sts row 33 knit © 2011 rebecca enoch for personal use only all rights reserved 1 sock baggie bead placement -place bead on crochet hook grab the stitch with the hook and push bead through down unto stitch -knit stitch as instructed row 34 k4 pb k27 *pb k27 repeat 2 more times* pb k23 4 beads row 35-39 knit row 40-63 repeat rws 34-39 4 more times row 64 repeat rw 34 decreasing row row 65 knit row 66 k2 *ssk k1 k2tog k23 repeat 2 more times* ssk k1 k2tog k21 104 sts row 67 knit row 68 k1 *ssk k1 k2tog k21 repeat 2 more times* ssk k1 k2tog k20 96 sts row 69 knit row 70 *ssk k1 k2tog k19 repeat 2 more times* ssk k1 k2tog k18 slip_stitch last st to beg of nxt round 88 sts row 71 knit row 72 *ssk k1 k2tog k17 repeat 2 more
